name: Wave Survivor
description:
THIS GAME IS IN EARLY DEVELOPMENT! (and it is also my first game)

WARNING! THIS IS A GRAPHICS INTENSE GAME. BEEFY COMPUTER RECOMMENDED.

Right now, this game isn't much, but later on, it will, hopefully, be a whole game where you have to survive hordes of enemies, while upgrading your weapon, trading, and, well, killing more enemies.

If you find any bugs, please put them in the comments so I can fix them!
